name: Exolotl: ZIAN
description:
Prince Zian and his friends embark on a mission to save their peaceful Exolotl Planet from the ruthless invasion of Planet Destroyer, King Orion, who has kidnapped Zian's father, the king of Exolotl. The adventure begins when Zian and his companions witness their Central City under attack while hunting in the jungle.



The team consists of Zian the Prince, Bark the Destroyer, Fury the Witch, Hazel the Comedian, and Quin the Hunter. With each progressing level, new friends join the fight, allowing players to switch between characters as needed. Each character boasts unique personalities, weapons, and abilities.


This challenging platform game, crafted by an indie developer, lets you play as five different characters throughout specific levels. You'll navigate through Zian's thrilling adventure to save their planet, encountering diverse enemies and bosses along the way. This game promises an enjoyable, fun experience with classic retro pixel art.
Your mission? SAVE EXOLOTL PLANET AND THE KING!

REVIEWER :
https://www.youtube.com/shorts/_DX2x5c--c0

FEATURES :
- 5 SWITCHING CHARACTERS IN DIFFERENT MOVE AND ABILITY
- SAVE THE AXOLOTL BABIES EACH LEVEL
- CUT SCENE STORIES 12+ EXOCTIC LEVEL AND 8 UNIQUE BOSSES
- A LOT OF ENEMIES SUCH AS : ALIENS, MUTANTS, ROBOTS, ETC
- LEVEL THEME JUNGLE, BEACH, UNDER THE SEA, SEWER, CYBERPUNK CITY, LABORATORY
- SAVE EXOLOTL PLANET AND THE KING!
